ch0128_10_mitsuru/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m fired up and ready for today! I’ll battle
you anytime!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7101_0701_01_10:
Whenever I wear this sygna suit, I feel like I’ve
been reborn.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s so nostalgic. It reminds me of when I first set
off on my adventure...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7101_0701_03_10: I’ll never forget how it felt at the beginning!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7102_0701_01_10: Gardevoir has the power to predict the future.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7102_0701_02_10:
There was a time recently when I was about to
trip on a rock, but he saved me!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7102_0701_03_10:
When I’m being taken care of like that, it’s hard to
tell which one of us is the Trainer, huh.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7102_0701_04_10: Yeah! I’ve got to pull myself together!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7103_0701_01_10:
Gallade tries to take the lead when he’s battling
alongside Gardevoir.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7103_0701_02_10:
They both evolve from the same Pokémon,
Ralts...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7103_0701_03_10:
So I guess he feels like he’s protecting a Pokémon
that might not be as experienced as he is.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7104_0701_01_10:
Gardevoir and Gallade show their true power
when they’re protecting something.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7104_0701_02_10:
And as their Trainer, I’d like to fight to protect
someone, too!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7105_0701_01_10:
I try to stay prepared so I can have a serious
battle at any time. It prevents me from getting
too flustered.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/7105_0701_02_10:
No matter who my opponent is, I’m ready to take
on anyone and give it my all—even if it’s you
or Brendan!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/1701_0701_01_10:
Thanks for always looking out for me! This is
for you.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/1701_0702_01_10:
I hope you find it helpful, no matter how you
decide to use it!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2501_0701_01_10:
When I was training in this place called the Battle
Resort in Hoenn, I heard a rumor...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2501_0701_02_10:
that in Kalos, there are some shops that won’t let
you in unless you’re stylish enough.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2501_0701_03_10: They’ll probably let me in dressed like this...right?
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2501_0702_01_10: I’m not so confident about fashion...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2501_0702_02_10:
I guess in order to battle, you have to study more
than just Pokémon...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2511_0701_01_10:
What makes me strong are the Pokémon who
battle by my side...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2511_0701_02_10:
and the people who battle me without
holding back.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2511_0701_03_10:
Everyone being here is important to me, so I’m
really grateful! I have to make sure I keep
growing stronger!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2511_0702_01_10: I’m not alone. That’s why I can get stronger.
ch0128_10_mitsuru/2511_0702_02_10: I’ll always remember that, deep in my heart!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/3001_0701_01_10:
When I wake up early, I feel like the day lasts
longer. It feels great!
ch0128_10_mitsuru/3003_0701_01_10:
After lots of training, my Pokémon and I get
really hungry...
ch0128_10_mitsuru/3005_0701_01_10:
I think we’ll get a really good night’s sleep if we
have an all-out battle before bed. What do
you say?
